name: Girl Fantasy
description:
Introduction to the game

This is a visual novel about youth. The player will play the role of a innocent teenager who falls into the trap of the sister next door step by step, and finally fails to resist the temptation and is lost in the arms of the sister next door.

Story

When I was painting at home, I was attracted by the knock at the door. When I opened the door, a girl appeared in front of the door and called me brother? It turned out that when I was a child, my neighbor's sister sneaked out to play with me.

Profile

Xiaoyi: The male leader's childhood sweetheart is lively and lovely. He likes to play tricks on the male leader.
